doc.name: CompositeCommunicationAspect
doc.description:
This class implements functionality of a composite communication aspect.

When an intermediate receiver sends a token to an input port of this communication aspect, the original receiver and the token are encoded in a RecordToken. When such a token arrives at an output port, the original token is extracted and sent to the original receiver.
doc.author: Patricia Derler
doc.property: This parameter indicates whether the tokens received via the ImmediateReceivers are immediately forwarded to the wrapped receivers or whether they are delayed by this communication aspect and only forwarded through a CommunicationResponsePort. This parameter is a boolean that defaults to false.
